name: Ayleouna
description:
Take Ayleouna on an asteroid hopping adventure in this action platformer with gravity bending elements

controls 

Move with WASD or left analogue stick

Jump with space or on a xbox controller button a or left bumper

Dodge roll with left shift or on a controller button b or right bumper

Crouch with C or on a controller button x

Currently there are 3 levels. More will be added later. I'm not sure how many there'll be in total. This game will remain free with no in app purchases when finished. It'll probably still be quite short.
